meanings.definition: Not emphasizing or stressing a particular point or idea.
meanings.sent1: Her nonemphatic response showed she didn't feel strongly about the topic.
meanings.sent2: The nonemphatic tone of the article made it easy to read.
meanings.sent3: The nonemphatic way he shrugged off the news was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His nonemphatic gestures spoke louder than words.
meanings.sent5: The nonemphatic colors of the painting blended softly together.

meanings.definition: Lacking emphasis or stress in speech or writing.
meanings.sent1: The nonemphatic delivery of the speech made it hard to follow.
meanings.sent2: Her nonemphatic writing style was simple and clear.
meanings.sent3: He gave a nonemphatic excuse for being late, which made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The nonemphatic melody of the song faded into the background.
meanings.sent5: The nonemphatic lines in the poem whispered gently to the reader.
